courses.name: Self taught graphic designer
courses.desc: Graphic design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving. The field is considered a Graphic design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving. The field is considered a subset of visual communication and communication design, but the term "graphic design" is sometimes used synonymously. Visual communication is a broad spectrum that includes signs, typography, drawing, graphic design, illustration, industrial design, advertising, animation, color, and electronic resources. Graphic Design is a complex task and requires you to have many skills and knowledge of tools that help in Graphic designing. This free graphic design course will provide you with a basic introduction into the field and introduce you to Photoshop as a graphic designing tool. With these graphic design tutorials, you will learn to work with the text, graphics, and other effects that made designing easier and interesting for artists, designers, and photographers.

courses.name: 8 Steps to Edit a Video in Premiere Pro
courses.desc: Video editing is a complicated process known in the film industry as Post-production. This video editing course will provide a brief understanding of the process. Nowadays, editing videos has become more accessible for people due to the availability of free software and web information sharing. This online video editing course will provide a guide to video editing fundamentals, its jargon, process, resources, and career options, etc., in the world of video editing.  Learn video editing skills for free with an introduction to video editing and the scope of the same in different industries. This free video editing course will take you through Premiere Pro's functioning and display how to create a video in Premiere Pro.
